purple-day_one-default.text: Listen to them speak: they will not say it. They will not utter its name, our rocky interloper
purple-day_one-default.speaker: purple

purple-day_one-default.text: They are afraid, all of them. But you must have no fear
purple-day_one-default.speaker: purple
